text: This is a direct assault on the democratic will of the people, and we must stand in solidarity with the opposition to defend our votes.
While the allegations are serious, the opposition should also present more concrete evidence to substantiate claims of an automated software manipulating rolls.
Regardless of the outcome, this incident highlights the need for a comprehensive review of election laws to prevent future controversies.
The technical details of the alleged automated software are crucial for a proper understanding and evaluation of these claims.
We need to understand the specific nature of the alleged manipulation and how it would have impacted the election results.
The ruling party's fear of losing is so great that they are resorting to outright fraud to stay in power.
